With his unique perspective on human history, I would travel through time, witnessing pivotal moments that shaped our world. I would attend ancient civilizations, observe the rise and fall of empires, and experience firsthand the transformative power of ideas and technological advancements. Harari's expertise would allow me to analyze the complex web of human societies, cultures, and economies, gaining a profound understanding of our collective past. Confidence score: 0.8

Goodall's compassion, intelligence, and passion for the natural world would inspire me to become a more effective steward of our planet. Confidence score: 0.85
